title: PM holds meeting with Chaudhry Nisar
content:
RAWALPINDI, Jun 29 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif Sunday visited political leader Chaudhry Nisar at his residence.
In the meeting, the prime minister inquired about Chaudhry Nisarâ€™s well-being.
They discussed the national and international situation during the meeting.
The meeting took place in a very pleasant atmosphere and both the leaders revived memories of the past.
